name: Unicorn Cell
description:
Submitted to #summerslowjams June 2018: Minigames (creative theme: "The World Is Alive.")

You're a tiny unicorn inside a unicorn cell inside a bigger unicorn... who knows where.

Your goal is to escape. Use your arrow controls and bump into organelles to interact with them.

Made in 5 hours with some tools (Bitsy and Borsky) I didn't even know existed the day before.
